nodes.bodyText: Do we have to change the Doc CI parameter as well? Do we need to make the change first?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -161,7 +161,7 @@ stages:

-                CIConfigs: "{'targets':[{'path_to_config':'package.json','mode':'Preview','monikerid':'1'},{'path_to_config':'package.json','mode':'Latest','monikerid':'0'}]}"

nodes.bodyText: No. I'm only adding an additional member to the JSON. The updates to the process haven't merged yet. This update is necessary to actually test.
